title: Who was the last of the 10 Companions Who Were Promised Heaven? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: uh before we conclude the 10 heaven-bound companions the last one who is the narrator of the Hadith that I forgot to mention his name is the cousin of his brother-in-law and his father is one of the people of hanafia who were on monotheism and the prophet knew him Allah before becoming a messenger he would not ever eat from anything slaughtered to the idol so these are the ten Heaven bout foreign
